plot: When crime and terrorism go out of control in Tokyo, the police unleash Team Warrior--a band of highly-skilled and completely reckless band of female cops. Featuring loose cannon Rio, trigger-happy Maya and ace hacker Lilica, Team Warrior will get the job done, regardless of the budget of the mission.
ending_theme: "I'll be with you all the time" by Wonder Love (ep 2)
"Ii yume dake wa mikata dakara (Only A Good Dream Is My Side)" by Wonder Love (ep 3)
